page.title: 16Insch pupils' visit contd..
page.content: We then went to the Art Department where we were shown the kiln room. After that we visited the History Department,where we were told about the school rules and discipline.If we do something wrong we will get punish_ ment exercises or detention. When we were finished in the History class we went to the gymnasium where we spoke to two gym teachers.Next we had our dinner.I had a sandwich,juice and a jelly.We then visited the Home Econo_ mics Department where the teacher talked mostly about cookery.Finally we entered a Geography class,where we looked at some maps and found the population of Scotland. I enjoyed myself very much.I should not have been so nervous because there was nothing to worry about, and now I know something about the Academy.It was a very interesting visit.
